attributes.action: Add lights to the natts lane skatepark in billingshurst
attributes.additional_details: Add lights to the skateprak in billingshurst so the lovely residents can rip it during the night!
attributes.background: Because it gets dark early in the winter we hardly have much time to skate after collage or school

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
